subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Thieves broke into the home of A.C. Milan midfielder Ronaldinho and stole thousands of dollars worth of goods, according to Italian news media reports. Ronaldinho was in his native Brazil when the burglary took place early Tuesday morning. The thieves took mainly jewelry and watches.
